page.title: 11Princes Park.
page.content: {Princes Park} is a large park with a wide range of facilities. For the very young there is an {Infant {Adventure playground} and paddling pool. {Older children} can enjoy pony rides, a bouncy castle and a playground. The {Crumbles pond}has swans as well as pedal and rowing boats. It is also used for model boats. Not far away are bowling greens and a miniature 18 hole golf course which costs 45p a round. In the centre of the park near the pond is a cafe. There is a large grass area which is used for football, cricket and { {stoolball.} Just over the road wasteground has provided several more football pitches. Adjacent to the park is a small Go-Kart track, windsurfing facilities, the Leisure Pool and a park for coaches & lorries.
